content.text: Kasha takes point, and the mild grass around the cabin quickly disperses into trees and shrubbery, which she navigates with practised ease. There's a vague hint of a path, but you can barely tell where it begins and where it ends.
Kozlov is following close behind, even with his more rugged manner of movement. The man is at least kind enough to spare you a glance over his shoulder and make sure you're still there.
